fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Interrogation**: Beat up a player, then learn their role. If they are evil, they will die the following night to an unstoppable attack also known as death if they don't get healed somehow.
**Attributes**
- **Smackdown**: If you are voted up, your role is revealed, but you don't die yet. Select a player who voted you. That player gets killed immediately (this is unpreventable by defense sorry) if they are evil, and if they were evil you instead don't get voted up.
